test.name: Cenário 1: Adicionar, marcar e filtrar todas as tarefas como concluidas

kw.name: Open Browser To Todo Site
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.
Abrir o navegador e acessar a url do site To-Do

kw.name: Add Multiple Todo Items
Add Todo Item
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
Adiciona um item de tarefa na lista pelo texto fornecido.

kw.name: Add Todo Item
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
Adiciona um item de tarefa na lista pelo texto fornecido.

kw.name: Add Todo Item
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
Adiciona um item de tarefa na lista pelo texto fornecido.
Adiciona múltiplos itens de tarefa na lista.

kw.name: Check Todo Item
Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
Marca o checkbox de uma tarefa pelo seu texto.

kw.name: Filter Todos By Status
Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
Filtra as tarefas pelo status: All, Active ou Completed.

kw.name: Assert Quantity Item Left
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Replace String Using Regexp
kw.doc: Replaces ``pattern`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Replace String Using Regexp
kw.doc: Replaces ``pattern`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
Verifica a quantidade de itens restantes.

kw.name: Assert Todo Items Are Visible
Assert Todo Item Is Visible
Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
Verifica se um item de tarefa com o texto especificado está visível na página.
Verifica se TODOS os itens de tarefa na lista estão visíveis na página.

kw.name: Assert Todo Items Are Not Visible
Assert Todo Item Is Not Visible
Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//label[@data-testid='todo-item-label' and normalize-space()='Atividade 1']' did not exist.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
Verifica se um item de tarefa com o texto especificado NÃO está visível na página.

kw.name: Assert Todo Item Is Not Visible
Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//label[@data-testid='todo-item-label' and normalize-space()='Atividade 3']' did not exist.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
Verifica se um item de tarefa com o texto especificado NÃO está visível na página.
Verifica se NENHUM dos itens de tarefa na lista está visível na página.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
